title: Microsoft Garamond failure
content:
Microsoft uses Monotype's version of Garamond. But after downloading Monotype's version, I came to the following discovery. Microsoft's version looks rather ragged. Especially the horizontal lines of the numbers 2 and 4...

Why is this?

comments.content: I had a similar problem with Palatino here on my Mac, and asked a similar question [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184859/http:/typophile.com/node/117317). Maybe that helps a little? Often times, types are revised over time and maybe you just ended up with an older and a revised copy...
Thanks. It seems that MS ships an older version. I hope they'll update or adjust it.
